user_preferences.input_methods: Enter key (not Shift+Enter) for quick feedback submission
user_preferences.settings_access: wants settings button for on-the-fly UX changes without asking me
user_preferences.timestamps: granular last-updated on each section with relative/absolute toggle
user_preferences.performance_metrics: TTI metrics in header, <50ms target for real-time updates
user_preferences.agent_expectations: complete autonomy - submit feedback, agent processes, changes appear automatically
user_preferences.navigation: keyboard-driven, Tab key swipes through full-screen views (Current Context → Feedback → Tasks → etc)
